data.name: Star Age: Space Combat
data.detailed_description:
In the 23rd century, chaos rules the galactic frontier. Outlaws, rebels, pirates, and more prowl the space lanes, hunted by those who would bring them to justice. In this wild era of human history, are you ready for combat?

GET READY TO FLY

Pilot a spacecraft with a complete arsenal of weapons.

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS

Compete in online multiplayer against your friends…and your enemies.

RULE THE FRONTIER

Prove that you’re the best pilot the galaxy has ever seen!




Star Age: Space Combat is coming to Steam Early Access! This is a work-in-progress build with some fundamental gameplay. More content will be added as the game progresses. The current version of the game has the following features:

  • Go for a test flight in the game's practice mode.
  • Play online using the custom server browser, in both public and private matches.
  • Fire lasers and missiles at your enemies.

Additional content, including ship customizations and ranked matchmaking, will be coming in later updates.

Pilot a spacecraft with a complete arsenal of weapons.

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS

Compete in online multiplayer against your friends…and your enemies.

RULE THE FRONTIER

Prove that you’re the best pilot the galaxy has ever seen!




Star Age: Space Combat is coming to Steam Early Access! This is a work-in-progress build with some fundamental gameplay. More content will be added as the game progresses. The current version of the game has the following features:

  • Go for a test flight in the game's practice mode.
  • Play online using the custom server browser, in both public and private matches.
  • Fire lasers and missiles at your enemies.

Additional content, including ship customizations and ranked matchmaking, will be coming in later updates.
data.short_description: Get ready to fly and challenge your friends in this multiplayer arcade space shooter!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8300 GS or AMD Radeon HD 6230
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 690 or AMD Radeon HD 7990
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
